original_text: I will cause your cruel enemies to destroy themselves. There will be so much blood that it will seem like wine. They will seem like people who have become drunk. Then people everywhere will recognize that I am the Lord. They will know that I am your Saviour and your Redeemer, and I am the Mighty One of Jacob.’ I will cause your cruel enemies to destroy themselves.
korean_text: 내가 너를 억압하는 자들에게 자기의 살을 먹게 하며 새 술에 취함 같이 자기의 피에 취하게 하리니 모든 육체가 나 여호와는 네 구원자요 네 구속자요 야곱의 전능자인 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: I will cause your cruel enemies
There will be so much blood
that it will seem like wine
will recognize that I am the Lord
They will know that I am your Saviour
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내가 너의 구원자인 것을 알리라

sentences.original_text: and I am the Mighty One of Jacob
I will cause your cruel enemies to destroy themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너의 잔인한 원수들이 스스로를 파멸하게 하리라
